content:
What is the difference between Social SECURITY Number (SS) vs Social BENEFICIARY Identifier (SB)?v
http://www.hl7.org/fhir/v2/0203/index.html
This is a medicare specific change, read more at: https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/New-Medicare-Card
SB was introduced as a generic type that was country independent and that was a true "type" - i.e. it didn't refer to a specific identifier system.
